About_text1: I am graduate University of Warmia and Mazury in Olsztyn, currently working as Navigation Information Analyst in aviation company.I am open to propositions and always strive to acquire new knowledge and experience.I like to learn new things and always looking for new challenges, thatâ€™ s why I decided, to take the first steps as Junior Front - end Developer.In February 2019 I finished 720 h of the course realized by Kodilla.Currently I am working on my own projects, trying to improve my skills and practice knowledge, which I learned.
About_text2: I also love good fantasy movies, games and books, below some facts about that:
hobby2: books read from the Witcher Saga
hobby4: series watched based on Marvel Comics
hobby5: books read from the Sword of the Truth saga
hobby6: which gives this number of pages read
skillText1: I always had a thirst for getting to know of computer software, how it works and I have a hunger to always keep on improving and learning new things
skillText2: Good communication is the key to success, not matter, whether in a team or with clients. Throughout my career I have worked with various people from various teams.
skillText3: I am an ambitious, hardworking individual and I don't give up until I finish my task.
skillText4: Throughout my work many times I had to face with different problems. Even now, when coding became my passion, this is a normal situation. Thanks to that, I'm learning more and solving problems makes more fun.
skillText5: My role requires strong organisational skills. I had to be able to work on many tasks at once, focus on most important items and coordinate other tasks.
skillText6: I am a perfectionist and I pay much attention to details. It is important for me to provide a 100% completed and good looking product.
skillText7: Working with various clients has taught me to deliver products on time and in line with their expectations. In this way, I gained trust and clients knew that they could count on me.
